column5: You won't be disappointed with this 4 bedroom, 3 full bath gorgeous waterfront home. Not only is it the classiest in the area it is also exceptionally clean. Premier fishing, beautiful coastal decor, comfortable beds and a fully stocked kitchen. We offer use of our private pool next door to this home for an additional fee of $200 plus tax/day.
column8: Coastal Class Waterfront w/private pool, fishing
